about_the_game: Coridden original soundtrack composed by Zofia Domaradzka. The essence of adventure seamlessly blends with the emotional depths of familial bonds and relationships. This captivating collection of tracks enhances the rich tapestry of Coridden’s fantasy world, drawing listeners into a saga filled with discovery, unity, and the intrigue of shapeshifting. Experience the soundtrack that transforms every moment in Coridden into an unforgettable emotional voyage!
